name: Cats 4 Leafie
description:
Cats 4 Leafie is a game made in 1 hour and designed entirely by my cousins Nora and Deven, who are  respectively 11 and 12 years old. Play as the intrepid Leafie on his epic quest to collect Cats, Memes, and Penises.

It is recommended that you download the game instead of running it in your browser in order to enjoy the best performance and graphics.

Features
  • explorable open world with epic vistas, crystal clear waters and enchanting forests
  • infinite cats, memes and penises to collect
  • original soundtrack
  • adult content
